games.name: cyberpunk-2077
games.title: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: An open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the megalopolis of Night City, where you play as a cyberpunk mercenary wrapped up in a do-or-die fight for survival.

minimum.processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
minimum.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon RX 470

recommended.processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
recommended.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon R9 Fury

games.name: witcher-3
games.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.description: A story-driven, next-generation open world role-playing game set in a visually stunning fantasy universe full of meaningful choices and impactful consequences.

minimum.processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
minimum.graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870

recommended.processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
recommended.graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290

games.name: red-dead-redemption-2
games.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: Winner of over 175 Game of the Year Awards, Red Dead Redemption 2 is an epic tale of life in America's unforgiving heartland.

minimum.graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB

recommended.graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB
